detailsData.title: Flat Fee Billing
detailsData.content: We predominantly use a flat fee billing structure. This ensures transparency and predictability in legal costs.

detailsData.title: International Experience
detailsData.content: We have an established network of agents for foreign trademark clearance, advice, and filings. This allows us to handle international IP matters efficiently.

detailsData.title: Flexible Arrangements
detailsData.content: We offer flexible working arrangements to ebb and flow with a company’s needs. This includes short-term and project-based IP support.

detailsData.title: Practical Legal Advice
detailsData.content: We provide timely, practical legal advice with a business-minded approach. Our goal is to align IP assets with business goals at every stage.

subHeading: Providing practical legal advice to maximize the value of your intellectual property
valueProp: JMS Legal helps US and internationally-based companies to align their IP assets with business goals at every stage, taking a practical, business-minded approach to IP creation, protection and portfolio management. Services include: Trademark clearance, prosecution and enforcement, Copyright filings, IP audits and portfolio optimization, Negotiation and preparation of license agreements and related contracts.
topics: Preparing and responding to cease and desist letters
Negotiation and preparation of license agreements and related contracts

testimonalData.text: I highly recommend Jackie; she is an absolute pleasure to work with. As a valuable thought partner, she consistently provides insightful and strategic guidance.
testimonalData.author: Clark Lagemann

testimonalData.text: During the last ten years, Jackie has provided timely and no-nonsense support for all things concerning IP both for the U.S. and global markets.
testimonalData.author: Phil Annett

testimonalData.text: Jackie is an exceptionally talented lawyer and IP expert. Her keen mix of trademark expertise with business sense was integral to project development and ultimately a successful national launch.
testimonalData.author: Larissa Hrabec
